transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir good morning, main Nidhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji Mohammad Wasim ji baat kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapki company registered hai, iske liye maine aapko call kiya tha services ke regarding.
Executive: Ji, so isme sir aapka jaise ek product hai aapka jiske buyleads aap consume karte hai par aapke catalog mein ye hai nahi. To isko update karna hai ya kaise matlab aap isme deal karte hai?
Customer: Kaunsa buylead hai?
Executive: Ek second, handmade rug karke.
Customer: Ye kya karna hai?
Executive: To ye catalog mein aapke add hai nahi sir iski aap buyleads consume karte hai.
Customer: Ha hai handmade rug handmade rug banata hai hath mera handmade ka kaam hai.
Executive: Accha accha.
Executive: Ek second to ye catalog mein nahi hai na abhi hamara update?
Customer: Thik hai update kar dijiye aap.
Executive: Thik hai kya price hoga sir iska?
Customer: Handmade ka?
Executive: Handmade rug ka. Handmade rug ka mahina hai wo aap karke usko ₹1500 square feet.
Executive: ₹1500.
Executive: ₹1500 square feet.
Customer: Accha square feet, okay, thik hai ek second rukiye.
Executive: To iske koi photos vagera bhi hogi aapke pass?
Customer: Ha photos mein de dunga aapko WhatsApp kar dunga. Aap WhatsApp pe haa bhej dijiye mein kar dunga.
Executive: Ha maine aapko WhatsApp pe kal ek group bhi banaya tha jisme mere matlab senior bhi hai. Aaa aap us pe mujhe share kariyega aur isme kuch na catalog ka aapka wo bhi baki hai specification. Jaise kuch kuch product hota hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap iska ek baar handmade rug ka specification bataiye material kaunsa hota hai ye cotton, wool, jute, polyester?
Customer: Wool wool wool hota hai wool hi wool wool hi wool.
Executive: Shape kaunsi hoti hai round, rectangular, square?
Customer: Kisi bhi size shape mein bane square bhi ban jayega.
Executive: Accha basically customize hai na?
Customer: Customize kar do na kuch bhi koi bhi shape mein.
Executive: Ha matlab customize aa gaya na?
Customer: Ha customize tarah se mein aap size isme dal do na 6 by 9, 5 by 8 kuch bhi dal do.
Customer: 5 by 8 dal do.
Executive: Accha nahi ye shape puch raha tha shape kis kaunsi shape ka hota hai? Shape mein sabhi shape mein all shape all shape.
Executive: All shape okay to ye sir use kis ke liye hota hai floor ke liye, home ke liye, hotel ke liye?
Customer: Kahin bhi use karo floor pe use karo home mein bhi floor pe use hota hai hotel mein bhi floor pe use hota hai. Kahin bhi use karo carpet kahin bhi use kar sakte hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur iska ek particular koi color hota hai color mein bhi hamara sabhi color.
Customer: Koi bhi jo jo color bologe wo color banega jo design bologe wo banega.
Executive: Thik hai matlab sab cheez customize hoti hai isme mein size bhi dal deti hu. Size bhi customize ho gaya.
Executive: Aur made in India hi hoga obviously hai.
Customer: Ha made in India made in India.
Executive: Thik hai ab isme iska photos aap mujhe ek baar share kariyega. Dusra isme kuch aur bhi product hai jiska low specification hai. Jaise ye aapka hand tufted acrylic carpet iska ye aa raha hai.
Executive: Size as per the requirement nylon. Iska koi brand hota hai sir?
Customer: Nahi koi brand nahi hota wo material hota hai wool bhi banta hai jo hand tufted ya hand knotted jo material bolenge wo material mein ban jayega. Mein manufacturer hu to kuch bhi jo aap bologe wo ban jayega.
Executive: Accha accha matlab sabhi product mein aapka aisa hai ya ek particular koi aisa product hai jisme sirf standard size hi milta hai?
Customer: Hand knotted hand tufted micro aur ye kya bolte hai hand knotted aur aapka ye shaggy ye aap jo kahoge wo banayenge jute ka bhi banayenge.
Executive: Accha accha iska bhi bana denge.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Okay kyunki isme na aapki kuch cheeze missing hai jaise catalog mein jaise red hand tufted wool carpet iska material aapka missing hai material.
Customer: Kaunsa kaunsa kaunsa?
Executive: Ek second hand hand tufted wool carpet.
Customer: Ha to hand tufted wool to hand tufted wool carpet hand knotted hand tufted hand tufted jo hota hai na wo hand tufted wool wool mein bhi banta hai silk mein bhi banta hai material hai wool milk material hai. To silk hand tufted jo hota hai wo wo ek matlab ek living karne ka part hai aur wool jo ho gaya wo wool material hai.
Executive: Accha wool material ho gaya matlab uske upar jo kaam hota hai wo silk mein bhi ho sakta hai.
Customer: Ha silk silk mein kaam karo wool mein kaam karo ya phir wool mein bhi material aate hai aur sare wool ek matlab ek name hai jaise aam aam naam hai aam ho gaya samajh rahe hai ki nahi?
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Wool name hai aam naam hai aam mein bahut sare tarah ke aam hote hai aapus aam hota hai jaise alphanso ho gaya dasheri aam hota hai aapka aur tota pari aam ho gaya bahut sare aam hote hai thik hai na to aap sabka rate alag hota hai waise wool mein bhi bahut sare material hai bahut sare type hai wool mein.
Executive: Accha accha thik hai aur ek aapka hand woven carpet hai iska kya rahega carpet type hand?
Customer: Hand hand hand made carpet hand made aur hand woven same cheez hai sirf made mane banana hota hai woven mane weaving karna hota hai to wo dono same cheez hai bas word ka missing word ka different hai.
Executive: Accha words ka different hai thik hai.
Customer: Ha naam cheez same hai jaise see watch look teeno ka matlab ek hi hai see mane dekhna hota hai but wo kahin kahin specification jagah lagta hai aur watch kisi ko continuously dekh rahe hai to watch kar rahe hai look mane sirf dekh ke hat jana hota hai to wo meaning ka wo sentence bola jata hai waha pe lagta hai samajh gaye ki nahi?
Executive: Accha accha accha thik hai to mein ek kaam karti hu isme aapka mein aapko WhatsApp pe bhi aapne dekha tha kal maine ek group banaya tha aapke sath?
Customer: Nahi abhi kal mein thoda vyast tha kal maine nahi dekha kuch bhi mein aaj aapko bhej deta hu us pe design bhej dunga aap usko.
Executive: Ha ha. Ha aur isme jo bhi requirement lagte hai na aapke catalog mein kuch bhi details missing hoti hai uska bhi mein screenshot aapko share karti hu. Aap ek baar mujhe jo bhi hai aap mujhe details ek baar fill karke bataiyega.
Customer: Ji okay sir.
Executive: Thik hai maine iska to aap mujhe handmade rug ka to aap mujhe photo share kar dena jab bhi aap free rahe.
Customer: Ji okay.
Executive: Thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- To update product catalog.

- Missing specifications in the catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the product catalog.

- Executive asked to share the photos of handmade rug.

- Executive asked to fill the missing details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share the photos and designs.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, specification, handmade rug
